Bash(git commit -m "fix(ux): Enable delayed expansion for errorlevel in pacts.bat

Windows batch files need setlocal enabledelayedexpansion and !errorlevel!
instead of %errorlevel% when checking exit codes inside IF blocks.

Added:
- setlocal enabledelayedexpansion at file start
- Changed all %errorlevel% to !errorlevel!
- Added [DEBUG] output to verify Salesforce test detection

This fixes the issue where session check was never triggered.")

Bash(git commit -m "fix(ux): Wait for Lightning UI instead of just URL change in session capture

The previous version closed browser too early because it detected URL change
from login.salesforce.com before 2FA completed.

Now waits for:
- URL contains .lightning.force.com OR .my.salesforce.com (Lightning UI)
- AND URL does NOT contain login.salesforce.com

This ensures browser stays open through entire 2FA flow until user reaches
the actual Salesforce home page.

Also increased polling interval from 2s to 3s and added clear status message.")
